title: Rose of the Adriatic
description: Wounded and faithless, Dr. Matthew Robbins arrives in a small Croatian village determined to discredit the visionary who claims to see the Mother of God. Matt believes only proven facts, and he's sure Anna is either lying or delusional. But, despite all his testing, he can’t disprove Anna’s visions--and what's worse, he finds himself falling for the beautiful woman who speaks the Virgin Mary.
author: K.M. Daughters
